title: The Celestial Scholar of the Floating Library
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed CG illustration, an elegant young female scholar/librarian in flowing white and blue Hanfu robes, standing in a magnificent Xianxia library aisle. She is carefully placing a stack of ancient books onto a massive, carved wooden bookshelf. Volumetric light from the golden hour sunset streams through huge arched windows, revealing a breathtaking view of floating mountain peaks, traditional Chinese architecture, and a misty valley below. The high ceiling is painted with a celestial constellation motif. Epic fantasy setting, 16:9 aspect ratio, digital painting, soft focus, serene atmosphere.
